def candidate(dataset, n):
    # Check if n is not larger than the dataset size
    if n > len(dataset):
        raise ValueError("n cannot be larger than the dataset size")

    # Sort the dataset in descending order
    sorted_dataset = sorted(dataset, reverse=True)
    
    # Return the first n elements of the sorted dataset
    return sorted_dataset[:n]
